termsofuse_signin_message.en: By signing in, you acknowledge that you've read and accpeted EGIPA's terms of use.
termsofuse_signin_message.ar: بتسجيل الدخول، أنت تقر بأنك قرأت و وافقت على شروط الإستخدام الخاصة بEGIPA

termsofuse_signup_message.en: By signing up, you acknowledge that you've read and accpeted EGIPA's terms of use.

termsofuse_continueWithFacebook_message.en: By continuing with your Facebook account, you acknowledge that you've read and accpeted EGIPA's terms of use.

termsofuse_continueWithGoogle_message.en: By continuing with your Google account, you acknowledge that you've read and accpeted EGIPA's terms of use.

termsofuse_continueWithApple_message.en: By continuing with your Apple ID, you acknowledge that you've read and accpeted EGIPA's terms of use.

termsofuse_imageUpload_message.en: By continuing with uploading images, you acknowledge that you've read and accpeted EGIPA's terms of use.
